description.overview: Use the hand constant to set the cursor to a pointing hand shape.
description.value: The hand constant returns the number 28
description.comments:
The following two statements are equivalent:
set the cursor to hand
set the cursor to 8
However, the first is easier to read and understand in LiveCode.
If you use the hand cursor or other standard cursors in your application, you must include it when you create your standalone. Make sure the "Cursors" option on the Inclusions section on the General screen of the Standalone Application Settings window is checked.
